# CPMaximumListSectionImageSize

**Global Variable**

The maximum size of an image in a list section.

## Declaration

```swift
let CPMaximumListSectionImageSize: CGSize
```

## Discussion

To properly size your images, use [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPInterfaceController/carTraitCollection] to determine the display scale of the car screen.

## Constants

- **CPGridTemplateMaximumItems**: The maximum number of buttons that a grid template displays.

items.description: The maximum number of buttons that a grid template displays.
